ipxact:component.ipxact:name: CAN_FD_IP_Core

ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:name: CAN_Registers
ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:description: CTU CAN FD is 32 bit peripheria with support of 8, 16 or 32 bit access. Unaligned access is not supported. Byte or half word access is supported. The memory is organized as Big endian. Write to read only memory location will have no effect. Read from write only memory location can return undefined values. The memory map of CTU CAN FD consists of following memory regions:

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DEVICE_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Identifer of CTU CAN FD. Can be used to check if CTU CAN FD is accessible correctly on its base address.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DEVICE_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Device ID

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Soft reset. Writing logic 1 resets CTU CAN FD. After writing logic 1, logic 0 does not need to be written, this bit is automatically cleared.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FDE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Flexible data rate enable. When flexible data rate is enabled CTU CAN FD recognizes CAN FD frames (FDF bit = 1).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ACF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Acknowledge Forbidden Mode. When enabled, acknowledge is not sent even if received CRC matches the calculated one.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bus monitoring mode. In this mode CTU CAN FD only receives frames and sends only recessive bits on CAN bus. When a dominant bit is sent, it is re-routed internally so that bus value is not changed. When this mode is enabled, CTU CAN FD will not transmit any frame from TXT Buffers,

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: STM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Self Test Mode. In this mode transmitted frame is considered valid even if dominant acknowledge was not received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AFM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Acceptance Filters Mode. If enabled, only RX frames which pass Frame filters are stored in RX buffer. If disabled, every received frame is stored to RX buffer. This bit has meaning only if there is at least one filter available. Otherwise, this bit is reserved.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TSTM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Test Mode. In test mode several registers have special features. Reffer to description of Test mode for further details.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ROM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Restricted operation mode.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: COMMAND
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Allows issuing commands to CTU CAN FD. Writing logic 1 to each bit gives a command to CTU CAN FD. After writing logic 1, logic 0 does not need to be written.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RRB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Release RX Buffer. This command flushes RX buffer and resets its memory pointers.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CDO
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Clear Data Overrun flag in RX buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERCRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error Counters Reset. When unit is bus off, issuing this command will request erasing TEC, REC counters after 128 consecutive ocurrences of 11 recessive bits. Upon completion, TEC and REC are erased and fault confinement state is set to error-active. When unit is not bus-off, or when unit is bus-off due to being disabled (SETTINGS[ENA] = '0'), this command has no effect.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXFCRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Clear RX bus traffic counter (RX_COUNTER register).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXFCRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Clear TX bus traffic counter (TX_COUNTER register).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CPEXS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Clear Protocol exception status (STATUS[PEXS]).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXNE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer not empty. This bit is 1 when least one frame is stored in RX buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXNF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: TXT buffers status. This bit is set if at least one TXT buffer is in "Empty" state.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data Overrun flag. This bit is set when frame was dropped due to lack of space in RX buffer. This bit can be cleared by COMMAND[RRB].

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EFT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error frame is being transmitted at the moment.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CTU CAN FD is receiver of CAN Frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CTU CAN FD is transmitter of CAN Frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EWL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: TX Error counter (TEC) or RX Error counter (REC) is equal to, or higher than Error warning limit (EWL).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IDLE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bus is idle (no frame is being transmitted/received) or CTU CAN FD is bus-off.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PEXS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol exception status (flag). Set when Protocol exception occurs. Cleared by writing COMMAND[CPEXS]=1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RTRLE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Retransmitt Limit Enable. If enabled, CTU CAN FD only attempts to retransmitt each frame up to RTR_TH times.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RTRTH
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Retransmitt Limit Threshold. Maximal amount of retransmission attempts when SETTINGS[RTRLE] is enabled.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ILBP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Internal Loop Back mode. When enabled, CTU CAN FD receives any frame it transmitts.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Main enable bit of CTU CAN FD. When enabled, CTU CAN FD communicates on CAN bus. When disabled, it is bus-off and does not take part of CAN bus communication.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NISOFD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Non ISO FD. When this bit is set, CTU CAN FD is compliant to NON-ISO CAN FD specification (no stuff count field). This bit should be modified only when SETTINGS[ENA]=0.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ISO_FD
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: The CAN Controller conforms to ISO CAN FD specification.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: NON_ISO_FD
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: The CAN Controller conforms to NON ISO CAN FD specification.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PEX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol exception handling. When this bit is set, CTU CAN FD will start integration upon detection of protocol exception. This should be modified only when SETTINGS[ENA] = '0'.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TBFBO
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: All TXT buffers shall go to "TX failed" state when CTU CAN FD becomes bus-off.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXTBUF_FAILED_BUS_OFF_ENABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT Buffers go to "TX failed" state when CTU CAN FD becomes bus-off.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXTBUF_FAILED_BUS_OFF_DISABLED
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT Buffers dont go to "TX failed" state when CTU CAN FD becomes bus-off.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FDRF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame filters drop Remote frames.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: INT_STAT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt Status register. Reading this register returns logic 1 for each interrupt which ocurred. Writing logic 1 to any bit clears according interrupt status. Writing logic 0 has no effect.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame received interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame transmitted interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EWLI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error warning limit interrupt. When both TEC and REC are lower than EWL and one of the becomes equal to or higher than EWL, or when both TEC and REC become less than EWL, this interrupt is generated. When Interrupt is cleared and REC, or TEC is still equal to or higher than EWL, Interrupt is not generated again.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DOI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data overrun interrupt. Before this interrupt is cleared , STATUS[DOR] must be cleared to avoid setting of this interrupt again.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FCSI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Fault confinement state changed interrupt. Interrupt is set when node turns error-passive (from error-active), bus-off (from error-passive) or error-active (from bus-off after reintegration or from error-passive).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ALI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Arbitration lost interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BEI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bus error interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXFI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer full interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit rate shifted interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RBNEI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer not empty interrupt. Clearing this interrupt and not reading out content of RX Buffer via RX_DATA will re-activate the interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: OFI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Overload frame interrupt.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXBHCI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: TXT buffer HW command interrupt. Anytime TXT buffer receives HW command from CAN Core which changes TXT buffer state to "TX OK", "Error" or "Aborted", this interrupt will be generated.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RX_SETTINGS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Settings of RX buffer FIFO.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RTSOP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Receive buffer timestamp option. This register should be modified only when SETTINGS[ENA]=0.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: RTS_END
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Timestamp of received frame in RX FIFO is captured in last bit of EOF field.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: RTS_BEG
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Timestamp of received frame in RX FIFO is captured in SOF field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: INT_ENA_CLR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt Enable Clear register. Writing logic 1 disables according interrupt. Writing logic 0 has no effect. Reading this register has no effect. Disabled interrupt wil not cause interrupt to be raised by CTU CAN FD even if it is set in Interrupt status register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INT_ENA_CLR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit meaning is equivalent to register INT_STAT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: INT_MASK_CLR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt Mask clear register. Writing logic 1 un-masks according interrupt. Writing logic 0 has no effect. Reading this register has no effect. If particular interrupt is un-masked, it will be captured in INT_STAT register when internal conditions for this interrupt are met (e.g RX buffer is not empty for RXNEI).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INT_MASK_CLR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit meaning is equivalent to register INT_STAT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: INT_MASK_SET
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt Mask set. Writing logic 1 masks according interrupt. Writing logic 0 has no effect. Reading this register returns logic 1 for each masked interrupt. If particular interrupt is masked, it won't be captured in INT_STAT register when internal conditions for this interrupt are met (e.g RX buffer is not empty for RXNEI).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INT_MASK_SET
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit meaning is equivalent to register INT_STAT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: INT_ENA_SET
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Interrupt Enable Set. Writing logic 1 to a bit enables according interrupt. Writing logic 0 has no effect. Reading this register returns logic 1 for each enabled interrupt. If interrupt is captured in INT_STAT, enabled interrupt will cause CTU CAN FD to raise interrupt. Interrupts are level-based, it remains active until Interrupt status is cleared or interrupt is disabled.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INT_ENA_SET
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit meaning is equivalent to register INT_STAT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: BTR_FD
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Bit timing register for data bit rate.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PH2_FD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Phase 2 segment

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROP_FD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Propagation segment

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PH1_FD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Phase 1 segment

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BRP_FD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit rate prescaler

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SJW_FD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Synchronisation jump width

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: VERSION
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Version register. Returns version of CTU CAN FD.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: VER_MINOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Minor part of CTU CAN FD version. E.g for version 2.1 this field has value 0x01.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: VER_MAJOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Minor part of CTU CAN FD version. E.g for version 2.1 this field has value 0x02.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: BTR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Bit timing register for nominal bit rate.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Propagation segment

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PH1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Phase 1 segment

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PH2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Phase 2 segment

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit rate prescaler

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SJW
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Synchronisation jump width

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ALC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Arbitration lost capture register. Determines position of last arbitration loss within CAN frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ALC_BIT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Arbitration lost capture bit position. If ALC_ID_FIELD = ALC_BASE_ID then bit index of BASE identifier in which arbitration was lost is given as: 11 - ALC_VAL. If ALC_ID_FIELD = ALC_EXTENSION then bit index of EXTENDED identifier in which arbitration was lost is given as: 18 - ALC_VAL. For other values of ALC_ID_FIELD, this value is undefined.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ALC_ID_FIELD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Part of CAN Identifier in which arbitration was lost.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ALC_BASE_ID
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Arbitration was lost during base identifier.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ALC_SRR_RTR
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Arbitration was lost during first bit after base identifier (SRR of Extended Frame, RTR bit of CAN 2.0 Base Frame)

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ALC_IDE
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Arbitration was lost during IDE bit.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ALC_EXTENSION
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Arbitration was lost during Identifier extension.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ALC_RTR
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Arbitration was lost during RTR bit after Identifier extension!

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ALC_RSVD
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Unit did not loose arbitration since last reset.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: EWL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Error warning limit register. This register shall be modified only when SETTINGS[ENA]=0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EW_LIMIT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error warning limit. If error warning limit is reached interrupt can be generated. Error warning limit indicates heavily disturbed bus.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ERP
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Error passive limit register. This register shall be modified only when SETTINGS[ENA]=0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERP_LIMIT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error Passive Limit. When one of error counters (REC/TEC) exceeds this value, Fault confinement state changes to error-passive.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: FAULT_STATE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Fault Confinement state of the CTU CAN FD.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error-passive

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BOF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bus-off

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error-active

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_VAL_A_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter A value. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If filter A is not present, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: FILTER_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Filter status indicates if frame filters are available in CTU CAN FD.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Logic 1 when Filter A is available. Otherwise logic 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Logic 1 when Filter B is available. Otherwise logic 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Logic 1 when Range Filter is available. Otherwise logic 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Logic 1 when Filter C is available. Otherwise logic 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TX_PRIORITY
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffers. Highest priority TXT buffer in "Ready" state is selected for transmission.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT1P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT2P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT3P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 3. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 3, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT4P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 4. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 4, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT5P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 5. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 5, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT6P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 6. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 6, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT7P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 7. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 7, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT8P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Priority of TXT buffer 8. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 8, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TX_COMMAND
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Command register for TXT buffers. Command is activated by writing logic 1 to TXC(E|R|A) bit. TXT buffer that receives the command is selected by setting bit TXB[1-8] to logic 1. Command and index must be set by single access. Register is automatically erased upon the command completion. Reffer to description of TXT buffer for meaning of commands. If TXCE and TXCR are applied simultaneously, only TXCE command is applied. If multiple commands are applied at once, only those which have effect in immediate state of TXT buffer are applied to the buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXCE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Issues "set empty" command.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXCR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Issues "set ready" command.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXCA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Issues "set abort" command.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 3. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 3, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB4
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 4. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 4, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB5
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 5. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 5, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB6
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 6. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 6, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB7
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 7. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 7, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXB8
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Command is issued to TXT Buffer 8. If number of TXT Buffers is less than 8, this field is reserved and has no function.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TIMESTAMP_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register with current value of CTU CAN FD time base. No shadowing is implemented on TIMESTAMP_LOW/HIGH registers and user has to take care of proper read from both registers, since overflow of TIMESTAMP_LOW might occur between read of TIMESTAMP_LOW and TIMESTAMP_HIGH.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TIMESTAMP_HIGH
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bits 63:32 of time base.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB_INFO
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register with information about supported features of TXT buffers.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TXT_BUFFER_COUNT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of TXT buffers present in CTU CAN FD. Lowest buffer is always 1. Highest buffer is at index equal to number of present buffers.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TIMESTAMP_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register with current value of CTU CAN FD time base. No shadowing is implemented on TIMESTAMP_LOW/HIGH registers and user has to take care of proper read from both registers, since overflow of TIMESTAMP_LOW might occur between read of TIMESTAMP_LOW and TIMESTAMP_HIGH.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TIMESTAMP_LOW
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bits 31:0 of time base.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: YOLO_REG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register for fun :)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: YOLO_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: What else could be in this register??

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SSP_CFG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Secondary sampling point configuration register. Used by transmitter in data bit rate for calculation of Secondary sampling point.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSP_OFFSET
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Secondary sampling point offset. Value is given as multiple of minimal Time quanta.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSP_SRC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source of Secondary sampling point.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: SSP_SRC_OFFSET
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: SSP position = SSP_OFFSET. Measured Transmitter delay value is ignored.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: SSP_SRC_MEAS_N_OFFSET
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: SSP position = TRV_DELAY (Measured Transmitter delay) + SSP_OFFSET.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: SSP_SRC_NO_SSP
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: SSP is not used. Transmitter uses regular Sampling Point during data bit rate.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DEBUG_REGISTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register for reading state of the controller. This register is only for debugging purposes!

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: STUFF_COUNT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Actual stuff count modulo 8 as definned in ISO FD protocol. Stuff count is erased in the beginning of CAN frame and increased by one with each stuff bit until Stuff count field in ISO FD frame. Then it stays fixed until the beginning of next frame. In non-ISO FD or normal CAN stuff bits are counted until the end of a frame. Note that this field is NOT gray encoded as defined in ISO FD standard. Stuff count is calculated only as long as controller is transceiving on the bus. During the reception this value remains fixed!

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DESTUFF_COUNT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Actual de-stuff count modulo 8 as defined in ISO FD protocol. De-Stuff count is erased in the beginning of the frame and increased by one with each de-stuffed bit until Stuff count field in ISO FD Frame. Then it stays fixed until beginning of next frame. In non-ISO FD or normal CAN de-stuff bits are counted until the end of the frame. Note that this field is NOT grey encoded as defined in ISO FD standard. De-stuff count is calculated in both. Transceiver as well as receiver.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_ARB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Arbitration field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_ACKD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in ACK Delimiter field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_ACK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in ACK field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_CRCD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in CRC Delimiter field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_STC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Stuff Count field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_CON
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Control field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_DAT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Data field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_CRC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in CRC field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_EOF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in End of file field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_SUSP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Suspend transmission field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_SOF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Start of frame field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_OVR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Overload field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PC_INT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Protocol control state machine is in Intermission field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX_FR_CTR_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of transmitted frames by CTU CAN FD.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RX_FR_CTR_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of received frames by CTU CAN FD.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ERR_CAPT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Error code capture register. Determines position within CAN frame where last error was detected.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERR_POS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Position of last error.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ERC_POS_EOF
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Error in End of frame field

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ERC_POS_ACK
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Error in CRC delimiter, ACK field or ACK delimiter

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERR_TYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Type of last error.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX2S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 2. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX1S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 1.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXT_TOK
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer is in "TX OK" state.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXT_NOT_EXIST
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer does not exist in the core (applies only to TXT buffers 3-8, when CTU CAN FD was synthesized with less than 8 TXT buffers).

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXT_TRAN
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer is in "TX in progress" state. CTU CAN FD is transmitting frame.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXT_ABTP
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer is in "Abort in progress" state.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TXT_RDY
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer is in "Ready" state, it is waiting for CTU CAN FD to start transmission from it.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX3S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 3. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX4S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 4. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX5S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 5. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX7S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 7. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX6S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 6. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX8S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Status of TXT buffer 8. Bit field meaning is analogous to TX1S.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TRV_DELAY
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Transmitter delay register. When transmitting CAN FD Frame, Transmitter delay is measured. After the measurement (after FDF bit), it can be read out from this register. The value in this register is valid since first transmission of CAN FD frame. After each next measurement the value is updated.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TRV_DELAY_VALUE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Measured Transmitter delay in multiple of minimal Time quanta.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RX_DATA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer data at read pointer position in FIFO. By reading from this register, read pointer is automatically increased, as long as there is next data word stored in RX buffer. First stored word in the buffer is FRAME_FORMAT_W, next IDENTIFIER_W etc. This register shall be read by 32 bit access.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RX_WPP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write pointer position in RX buffer. Upon store of received frame write pointer is updated.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RX_RPP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Read pointer position in RX buffer. Upon read of received frame read pointer is updated.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RX_BUFF_SIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size of RX buffer in 32-bit words.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RX_MEM_FREE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of free 32 bit words in RX buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer is empty. There is no CAN Frame stored in it.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer is full, all memory words of RX buffer are occupied.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXFRC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX buffer frame count. Number of CAN frames stored in RX buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RXMOF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX Buffer middle of frame. When RXMOF = 1, next read from RX_DATA register will return other than first word (FRAME_FORMAT_W) of CAN frame.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: FILTER_CONTROL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Filter control register. Configures Frame filters to accept only selected frame types. Every bit is active in logic 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FANB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Basic Frame is accepted by filter A.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FAFB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Basic Frame is accepted by filter A.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FANE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Extended Frame is accepted by Filter A.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FAFE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Extended Frame is accepted by filter A.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FBNB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Basic Frame is accepted by filter B.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FBNE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Extended Frame is accepted by Filter B.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FBFB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Basic Frame is accepted by filter B.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FBFE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Extended Frame is accepted by filter B.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FCNB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Basic Frame is accepted by filter C.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FCNE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Extended Frame is accepted by Filter C.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FCFB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Basic Frame is accepted by filter C.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRFE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Extended Frame is accepted by Range filter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRFB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Basic Frame is accepted by Range filter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRNE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Extended Frame is accepted by Range filter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRNB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN Basic Frame is accepted by Range filter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FCFE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CAN FD Extended Frame is accepted by filter C.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_RAN_HIGH_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Range filter High threshold. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If Range filter is not supported, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_RAN_LOW_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter Range Low threshold. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If Range filter is not supported, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_VAL_C_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter C value. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If filter A is not present, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_MASK_C_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter C mask. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If filter A is not present, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_VAL_B_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter B value. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If filter A is not present, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_MASK_B_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter B mask. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If filter A is not present, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BIT_MASK_A_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Filter A mask. The identifier format is the same as in IDENTIFIER_W of TXT buffer or RX buffer. If filter A is not present, writes to this register have no effect and read will return all zeroes.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CTR_PRES
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Counter preset register. Error counters can be modified via this register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CTPV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Counter value to set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PTX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Preset value from CTPV to TX Error counter (TEC).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PRX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Preset value from CTPV to RX Error counter (REC).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENORM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Erase Nominal bit rate error counter (ERR_NORM).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EFD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Erase Data bit rate error counter (ERR_FD).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERR_FD_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of errors which occured in data bit rate.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ERR_NORM_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of errors which occured in nominal bit rate.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: TX error counter (TEC).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: REC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RX error counter (REC).

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RETR_CTR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Current value of Retransmit counter.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RETR_CTR_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Current value of retransmitt counter.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_1
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 1. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB1_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB1_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB1_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB1_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB1_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB1_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_2
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 2. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB2_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB2_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB2_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB2_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB2_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB2_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_3
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 3. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB3_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB3_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB3_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB3_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB3_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB3_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_4
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 4. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB4_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB4_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB4_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB4_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB4_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB4_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_5
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 5. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB5_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB5_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB5_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB5_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB5_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB5_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_6
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 6. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB6_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB6_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB6_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB6_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB6_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB6_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_7
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 7. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB7_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB7_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB7_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB7_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB7_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB7_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: TX_Buffer_8
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Access to this memory region is mapped to TXT buffer 8. CAN FD frame for transmittion can be inserted to this buffer. The frame layout corresponds to the layout described in Chapter "CAN FD frame format". First adress in this region (TXTB8_DATA_1) corresponds to FRAME_FORMAT_W, second address (TXTB8_DATA_2) corresponds to IDENTIFIER_W etc. The last address (TXTB8_DATA_20) corresponds to DATA_61_64_W. The adresses in between correspond linearly. This memory region is write only and read access will return all zeroes. This region supports only 32 bit access. This region is write only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB8_DATA_20
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to DATA_61_64 word.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB8_DATA_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to FRAME_FORM word

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TXTB8_DATA_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This adress word corresponds to IDENTIFIER word.

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: Test_registers
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Test registers memory region. Contains registers with manufacturing testability features.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TST_CONTROL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Testability control register. Contains configuration of test functions.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TWRSTB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writing 1 executes write acess to a memory/address given by TST_DEST register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TMAENA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enable test access to CTU CAN FD memories.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TST_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address for test memory access within tested memory.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TST_MTGT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Target memory to be accessed.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF1
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 1 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_RXBUF
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: RX buffer memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_NONE
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: No target memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF3
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 3 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF2
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 2 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF7
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 7 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF8
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 8 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF6
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 6 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF5
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 5 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: TMTGT_TXTBUF4
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: TXT buffer 4 memory is selected for test access.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TST_WDATA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write data for test access.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TST_RDATA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Read data for test access.

ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:name: CAN_Frame_format
ipxact:memoryMap.ipxact:description: CAN Frame format describtion as it is stored in TXT Buffers and RX Buffer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: FRAME_FORMAT_W
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Frame format word with CAN frame metadata.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DLC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data Length Code.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RTR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Logic 1 indicates Remote frame. Has meaning only for CAN frames. CAN FD does not have RTR frames.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: NO_RTR_FRAME
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: CAN frame is not RTR frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IDE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Extended Identifier Type. Logic 1 indicates CAN frame with both Base identifier and Identifier extension. Logic 0 indicates CAN frame with only Base identifier.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FDF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Flexible Data-rate Format. Distinguishes between CAN 2.0 and CAN FD Frames.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BRS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bit Rate Shift. In case of CAN FD frames indicates whether bit rate is shifted CAN FD frame. This bit has no meaning for CAN frames.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: BR_SHIFT
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Bit rate should be shifted if frame is CAN FD frame.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: BR_NO_SHIFT
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Bit rate should not be shifted if frame is CAN FD frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ESI_RSV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error State Indicator bit for received CAN FD frames. Bit has no meaning for CAN frames nor for transmitted CAN FD frames (in TXT buffer).

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ESI_ERR_ACTIVE
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Transmitted of received CAN FD frame is error active.

ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:name: ESI_ERR_PASIVE
ipxact:enumeratedValue.ipxact:description: Transmitted of received CAN FD frame is error passive.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RWCNT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size of CAN frame in RX buffer without FRAME_FORMAT WORD. (E.g RTR frame RWCNT=3, 64 Byte FD frame RWCNT=19). In TXT buffer this field has no meaning.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: IDENTIFIER_W
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: CAN Identifier.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IDENTIFIER_BASE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base Identifier of CAN frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IDENTIFIER_EXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Extended Identifier of CAN frame. Has meaning only if IDE of FRAME_FORMAT_W is EXTENDED.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TIME_STAMP_L_W
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lower 32 bits of timestamp when the frame should be transmitted or when it was received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TIMESTAMP_U_W
